name:
Just gave ChatGPT the prompt “Write a short story about Jesus Christ and Santa Claus engaged in an epic battle to prove who is the true reason for the season. There should be a clear winner and the loser should be forever vanquished.”

I was not disappointed in the response. Try it yourself!
